thread.title: Rio Ferdinand slams Man United duo: I’ve criticised Arsenal stars for doing this
thread.title_full: Rio Ferdinand slams Man United duo: I’ve criticised Arsenal stars for doing this

title: Rio Ferdinand slams Man United duo: I’ve criticised Arsenal stars for doing this
text:
Rio Ferdinand slams Man United duo: I’ve criticised Arsenal stars for doing this RIO FERDINAND has slammed Manchester United duo Paul Pogba and Jesse Lingard for their social media antics. PUBLISHED: 04:20, Wed, Feb 1, 2017 | UPDATED: 04:21, Wed, Feb 1, 2017 A video posted by Paul Labile Pogba (@paulpogba) on Jan 31, 2017 at 6:38am PST 
Paul Pogba uploaded a video to Instagram of him and his Manchester United team-mate Lingard dancing in the dressing room. 
Ferdinand has been critical in the past of players clowning around on social media, aiming a swipe at Arsenal for their selfies. 
And speaking ahead of United’s clash against Hull tonight (8pm), the Red Devils legend took a dim view of the aforementioned duo's actions. GETTY Paul Pogba and Jesse Lingard were seen joking around in the dressing room on social media Manchester United predicted XI to face Hull Mon, January 30, 2017
